segments.text: I'd like to speak to Robert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Robert . This is Frank . I'm coming to Guangzhou on the the 7th and I'd like to call in to discuss the project plan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . What time are you coming ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , my flight leaves at 8 a . m . , and I'll arrive at 10 a . m . Shall we say 11 o'clock ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we make it 11:30 ? A customer will come to the office at 11 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . That's fine with me . Maybe we can have lunch together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I'll see you on the 7th .
segments.speaker: S2
